dct_title_s: Particular draughts of some of the chief African Islands in the Mediterranean, as also in the Atlantic and Ethiopic Oceans : drawn from the most approv'd foreign maps & charts, and regulated by astronl. observations
dct_description_sm: 8 maps on 1 sheet; 18 x 22 cm or smaller, sheet 43 x 50 cm

Scales differ ; Conic projection. ; Relief shown pictorially.; Probably from: A complete system of geography / by Emanuel Bowen. London : Printed for W. Innys, R. Ware etc., 1747.; 'No. 68'--Lower right corner of sheet.; Cape Verde Islands longitude is measured from Cape Verde.; Area: Malta; Tenerife; Cape Verde Islands; St. Helena; Madeira.; Maps show islands, mountains, forested areas, rivers, coastal waters, anchoring places and settlements.
dct_publisher_sm: [Printed for W. Innys, R. Ware etc.?]
